name: Last Survivor (21stargames - Varde Siddharth)
description:
Last survivor is a zombie apocalypse game where you are the last person in a city and you have to reach to the Old Church where other survivors are.

This game was created during a game jam in One week.

This game is created by - 

Level Design - Shobhit Sahu.

Level Design - Yash Pardhi.

Ui design - Romit Rao.

Programming - Siddharth Varde
